title: Chicken broccoli crescent rolls
directions: Preheat your oven to 375 degrees and cook broccoli until tender (I usually microwave it for 3 minutes).
Unroll the crescent roll dough and arrange in a circle on baking sheet, with the pointy edges pointing outward.
Sprinkle cheese along the base of the crescent rolls, then add a slice of chicken and a broccoli floret.
Roll crescent roll back up and pinch the ends together to seal the dough.
Bake for 12 to 15 minutes, until light golden brown.
You can easily substitute different cheeses or turkey in this crescent roll recpie!
